showerReviews.reviewText: You should have paid me $10 to take a shower here. Smells awful, no ventilation, nowhere to set your stuff. No soap, no shelves in the shower either. ‚Ä¶

Showers were nasty, after having to wait for it to be cleaned. Apparently all the girl did was spray bleach on everything and then turn the shower on to rinse it out. When I asked for a shower, the girl said she would have to clean it first ‚Ä¶
It's very nasty bugs in the shower

showerReviews.reviewText: This place is amazing.  Showers been remodeled and they are amazing.  Super clean and they look great.  Water temperature was perfect and doesn‚Äôt fluctuate during your shower.  Staff was super nice and they all had a great personality.  Ver ‚Ä¶

Shower temperature was horrible it was ice cold. I told the gentleman at the front desk and he did not seem to care . He shrugged his shoulder and just asked what shower it was. The lady that helped us purchase the shower was pleasant and ‚Ä¶
Use their shower. It was nice. Sucks that It costed $17. They do offer wash/dry off towels & cheap hotel soap and shampoo; lol my skin was dry after that.

Semi Parking is only $10 a hot shower for $12. Super clean lot and building. I did not get fuel here, but will in the future. Fuel bats are devoid of spilled fuel. Only about 20 tractor trailer parking spots, but there is a perfect amount ‚Ä¶

Definitely a HIDDEN GEM! I absolutely LOVE the bathroom and shower room design. The place is bright and we'll organized. The entire place is so clean and I mean spotless! The staff is super friendly. I highly recommend!

Clean, shiny brand new truck stop on the north side of Temple. Great place to.purchase time in the shower facilities if you end up with a plumbing emergency not quickly rectified. Friendly staff with high attention to detail.
Very friendly well lit. Great service.  Shower was clean.
They have the Cleanest restroom's & Shower's I've seen in a public restroom'...and they have a wide variety of different kinds of snacks.
One of the best truck stop in Temple, Texas. Super clean bathroom and shower! Super friendly staff! Definitely will come back again!
Wonderful clerk helped me out and the showers I was in was immaculate and lots of space and very organized for me to put my stuff down to take shower...üòÄüòÅüòá ‚Ä¶

locations.street: Rodeo Travel Center / Truck Stop 4.5(61)Petrol Station
locations.content: Rodeo Travel Center / Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I never imagined food at a gas station could be this good! The place is clean, well-kept, and has a welcoming atmosphere. The staff are always friendly and helpful, which makes the stop even better. It has become my go-to spot for lunch whenever I travel from San Antonio to Corpus Christi!!
Very clean not alot of parking about 23 parking spots. Good food here.

A nice little place to stop. Not a lot of truck parking but I found a spot at 15:30.
Clean building and lot. Nice people.

Amazing place to stop on my drive everyday! Easy access into the station along with some great food! Try out the Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich. Best of all, clean facility with clean restrooms. Will visit often!

This travel center is a great stop for anyone going to Dallas on 35. The food is tasty, restrooms are clean, and they‚Äôve got everything you might need for your journey. Free truck parking in the back and diesel pumps on the side. It‚Äôs well-maintained and traveler-friendly!
Great place to stop by on long rides! Had a great selection of snacks and drinks as well as tasty food on their menu. This store was kept super clean and was very customer friendly

‚Ä¶ I'll save you the pictures of the rubbish mouse droppings and dead bugs in the corner of the bathroom. Absolutely unacceptable I can't imagine having to sit to do any "business" in one of these stalls much less use a shower
